MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG12 postcode area of Annan. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. We now expect your supply to be restored by 8AM. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.35AM on 23rd March 2021.
